course.subject: MARK
course.name: Leveraging Digital/ Direct Marketing for Customer Acquisition and Retention
course.description: This course will present an in-depth analysis of digital/direct marketing, focusing primarily on the scientific foundations upon which this marketing discipline is built. Attention will be on various formulae that are used to predict probability of response, forecast potential profit, and inform testing and campaigning. Students will also learn the critical ingredients for success within developing creative positions and creating offers. The specific differences between digital/direct marketing and general marketing/advertising will also be highlighted.
